con:method.name: Create new token or refresh token

con:testStep.name: Set asset path

con:config.script:
import java.io.File;
pFile = new File(testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPath()) assetDir = new File(pFile.getParentFile(), "asset") activityDir = new File(assetDir, "activity") photoDir = new File(activityDir, "photo") testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("asset_path", assetDir.getPath()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("activity_photo_path", photoDir.getPath()) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("_dir_", File.separator)

con:testStep.name: Successful request with grant_type is password

con:config.methodName: Create new token or refresh token

con:restRequest.name: Successful request with grant_type is password

con:testStep.name: Save token for all test case

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Successful request with grant_type is password").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("token", slurperresponse.access_token ) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("refresh_token", slurperresponse.refresh_token ) log.info (slurperresponse)

con:restRequest.name: Get an Activity

con:configuration.token: (?s).*Successful create an activiy \(Home Page\) with 2 photos.*

con:testStep.name: GET - Get token security

con:restRequest.name: GET - Get token security

con:testStep.name: Tranfer security_token

con:config.script:
import groovy.json.JsonSlurper import java.security.MessageDigest
responseContent = testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("GET - Get token security").getPropertyValue("response") slurperresponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responseContent) def api_secret_key = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.getPropertyValue( "api_secret_key" ) def security_key = api_secret_key + slurperresponse.key def security_token = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5").digest(security_key.bytes).encodeHex().toString() testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("security_token", security_token ) testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("key", slurperresponse.key )
